detectors.description:
REVOstake.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#674-689) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#680)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#683)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in REVOstake.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#660-663):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#661)
		- bpt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#584)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#515)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#515)
		- yfi.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#669)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#610)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#609)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#668)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#612)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#662)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVOstake.sol#613)
